# loadFactoryPreset(_:)

**Instance Method**

Configures the audio distortion unit by loading a distortion preset.

## Declaration

```swift
func loadFactoryPreset(_ preset: AVAudioUnitDistortionPreset)
```

## Parameters

- **preset**: The distortion preset.

## Discussion

For more information about possible values for `preset`, see [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioUnitDistortionPreset]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioUnitDistortionPreset/drumsBitBrush].

## Configuring the distortion

- **AVAudioUnitDistortionPreset**: Constants that represent preset audio distortions.
